labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The first time the overlay is opened in a game after it is launched, it always opens general chat on the top server
data.expected_result: The overlay *should* initially be on the server that the player is in on the canary application
data.short_description: Whenever a new game is played, the discord overlay automatically reverts to the top server on your server list.
data.steps_to_repro: - go to server of choice- open game of choice - press overlay keybind (shift & `)
